attributes.action: Stop the decision to hand back horses to the owners, cruelty must stop
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
IF YOU LOVE ANIMALS, HORSES AS WELL, THEN SIGN THIS PETITION, AS VIEWERS OF ITV LONDON WILL KNOW, THE OWNERS WERE ARRESTED OVER LOTS OF DEATHS OF THEM POOR HORSES, 82 ARE STILL WITH THE RSPCA LUCKILY.

THESE HORSES WERE WEAK, COULDNT WALK AND CLOSE TO DEATH, NOW THEY ARE BEING RETURNED TO THE OWNERS, DO YOU REALLY THINK THEY ARE GOING TO BE SAFE????

FOR THE HORSES WELFARE. SIGN THIS TO STOP IT NOW, FULL STOP!!!!!!
